detaileddescription.para: MARTY plugins are additional libraries that rely on MARTY but are shipped in separate libraries. The requirements are the following:

listitem.para: A MARTY plugin should have its own directory in marty-plugins/
A MARTY plugin should generate its own libraries, static and shared
A MARTY plugin can depend on MARTY, the contrary should never be true i.e. MARTY cannot depend on a plugin
A MARTY plugin should be tested automatically
